programlisting:
bucket := flag.String("b", "", "The bucket") object := flag.String("o", "", "The file to upload") kmsKey := flag.String("k", "", "The KMS key to encrypt with") flag.Parse()
if *bucket == "" || *object == "" || *kmsKey == "" { fmt.Println("You must supply a bucket (-b BUCKET), object to upload (-o OBJECT), and KMS key (-k KEY)") return }
